name: What Remains
description:
Waking with a pounding headache, you find yourself in a mansion on the eve of 1930 - but you are not alone.

What Remains is a horror game originally created for the Asylum Jam 2014 (#asylumjam) and has since been worked into a much better horror experience that will continue to grow better and ... more horrifying!

Give it a go for free, we have decided to hold off on production of this for a while, considering VR deployment in the future!

new version 0.41a
